name: Grunt / Hench / Boss
description:
This is my first release and only a demo; just part of the planned game. It is built with the Unity game engine and Game Creator visual scripting. 

The assets, UI, artwork and art style, graphics, sounds and animations will be changed for the final game, these ones are either free or purchased as a bundle at a low cost. This demo is purely to test the game mechanics, and as such, the models are known to be mismatched in their graphic style.

Please read the Info page in the Menu for more information and controls.

Background

You are a Marauder; a raider and pillager of villages. You and your companions plan attacks, looking for resources and slaying anyone who stands in your way.

But lately the village leaders have started to hire Heroes to defend them. Your tribe is known to be ruthless, so these Heroes are strong, well equipped and able to defeat multiple enemies. Your raiding party should be ready for large numbers of deaths in battle.

After the Enemy Hero is defeated the village buildings will be free to Pillage for resources and buffs.
